channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report I-2024110025
item.description:
Report I-2024110025

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-20T12:31:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-03
  • City: Columbia
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: POPE TRANSPORT INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 12500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: On October 3,2024 EJ Pope made a delivery to Pop's Fuel. A minor spill was reported by the driver. On October 8,2024, EJ Pope was notified that a larger release had occurred. First Call Environmental was dispatched to inspect the area and perform the required cleanup. First Call Environmental responded and inspected the site. First Call Environmental confirmed that no waterways were affected by the release, however some impacted soil was located. Completion of site cleanup is pending.
